mapper.sql: user.f_id as user_f_id, user.f_user_name as user_f_user_name, user.f_real_name as user_f_real_name, user.f_id_card as user_f_id_card, user.f_pay_pwd as user_f_pay_pwd, user.f_mobile as user_f_mobile, user.f_state as user_f_state, user.f_last_pwdmod_time as user_f_last_pwdmod_time, user.f_device_id as user_f_device_id, user.f_sys_add_time as user_f_sys_add_time, user.f_sys_upd_time as user_f_sys_upd_time, user.f_sys_del_time as user_f_sys_del_time, user.f_sys_add_user as user_f_sys_add_user, user.f_sys_upd_user as user_f_sys_upd_user, user.f_sys_del_user as user_f_sys_del_user, user.f_sys_del_state as user_f_sys_del_state
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_user user
order by ${orderByClause}
